com.communote.server.core.crc

Interface MetadataRepositoryConnector

  • All Superinterfaces:
    RepositoryConnector, Serializable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    FilesystemConnector

    public interface MetadataRepositoryConnector
extends RepositoryConnector
    A repository connector that supports storing additional metadata
    Author:
    Communote GmbH - http://www.communote.com/

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      ContentMetadata getMetadata(ContentId contentId)
      Return the ContentMetadata that is associated with the given ContentId.
      void updateMetadata(ContentMetadata metadata)
      Update the metadata of existing content with the provided metadata.

      • Methods inherited from interface com.communote.server.core.crc.RepositoryConnector

        clearContent, deleteContent, getConfiguration, getContent, getRepositorySize, getRepositorySizeLimit, getRepositorySizeLimitRatio, getRepositorySizeLimitRatio, removeConnector, storeContent

    • Method Detail

      • getMetadata

        ContentMetadata getMetadata(ContentId contentId)
        Return the ContentMetadata that is associated with the given ContentId.
        Parameters:
        contentId - The ContentId for the ContentTO to be read.
        Returns:
        The read ContentMetadata.
        Throws:
        ContentRepositoryException - in case reading the metadata failed

      • updateMetadata

        void updateMetadata(ContentMetadata metadata)
             throws ContentRepositoryException
        Update the metadata of existing content with the provided metadata. The ContentId of the content to update is contained in the according metadata field.
        Parameters:
        metadata - The ContentMetadata to update.
        Throws:
        ContentRepositoryException - in case the metadata cannot be updated.
